sentences: Ma valisin sinu jaoks parima lahenduse.
Meie valisime selle restorani tänu headele arvustustele.
context: The Estonian verb 'valima' means to choose or select something. It is an infinitive form that can be conjugated in different tenses and moods depending on the context of the sentence. In the examples provided, it's used in present tense ('valisin'), present tense with third person singular ending ('valibad'), and first person plural past tense ('valisime').
